snippet.title: Speedy the Rollerskater - Full game available to download!
snippet.description:
Speedy the Rollerskater

Game: Complete

Download: https://drive.google.com/file/d/14_fqmbcAU7KnOhkP5tS6_o6I1Z7wXu0Q/view?usp=sharing

Features:
7 Zones
Boss fights
Cutscenes
Music from Newgrounds Audio Portal and Opengameart.org
Inspired by Sonic 1 (16-Bit and 8 bit versions)

Plot:
Speedy's island is in danger... glacial danger! The evil Iceman tricked the inhabitants of the island with ice cream and candys and plots to turn the whole island in a glacial paradise for himself! Play as Speedy and skate through 7 zones of non-stop action! Relax in a sunny beach, explore the depths of the jungle, visit a honey cave and the ruins of an empire, dive under the sea exploring more ruins, have fun in a candy factory, and sail the air to fight Iceman face-to-face on his Air Ice Base!

Controls:

Left and Right arrows: Move Speedy
Up arrow: Looking up
Down arrow: Crouching
Space Bar: Jump (also skipping cutscenes)
Space Bar + Down arrow: Spin Dash
Space Bar + Up arrow: Peel Out
Space Bar + Space Bar (repeatdly): Swimming (only when you're underwater)
Esc: Allows you to come back to the title screen and/or exit the game.

Created with Open Surge Engine by Alexander Martins (https://opensurge2d.org/)

This game is inspired on the 2D Sonic classic games and has a similar gameplay, but with original characters, story, etc.

Music used: The Final Encounter (Syrapt0r - Newgrounds Audio Portal)

DISCLAIMER:

This game is free and open source. It means you can share, study and modify/fix something you don't like or you think it needs a fix.
If you share or put this game in somewhere, please give me credit.

This game will also be available on SFGHQ, Sonic Fan Games HQ (https://sonicfangameshq.com/) for the SAGE 2021 expo
